mapper.select: SELECT memberid, pwd, name, photo, regdate, birth FROM member where memberid = #{memberId}
SELECT no, ${name} AS name, ${photo} AS photo FROM ${table} WHERE ${name}||' '||NVL(info,' ')||' '||NVL(addr1,' ')||' '||NVL(addr2,' ') LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND rownum < 5
SELECT tagcode, tagname FROM hashtagtable WHERE tagname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND rownum < 5

SELECT type, no FROM (SELECT type, no, tagcode, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM review NATURAL JOIN reviewtohashtag GROUP BY type, no, tagcode ORDER BY cnt DESC) NATURAL JOIN hashtagtable WHERE tagname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND cnt > 3 AND rownum < 5
SELECT tagcode, tagname FROM (SELECT tagcode, tagname FROM hashtagtable ORDER BY regdate DESC) WHERE rownum < 8
SELECT tagcode, tagname, count FROM (SELECT tagcode, tagname, count FROM hashtagtable ORDER BY count DESC) WHERE rownum < 8
SELECT tagcode, tagname, count FROM hashtagtable

SELECT type, no FROM (SELECT type, no, rownum AS num FROM (SELECT type, no FROM (SELECT type, no, tagcode, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM review NATURAL JOIN reviewtohashtag GROUP BY type, no, tagcode ORDER BY cnt DESC) NATURAL JOIN hashtagtable WHERE tagcode=#{tagcode} AND cnt > 3)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM hashtagtable WHERE tagcode=#{tagcode}

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12) FROM (SELECT type,no,tagcode,COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM review NATURAL JOIN reviewtohashtag GROUP BY type,no,tagcode ORDER BY cnt DESC) NATURAL JOIN hashtagtable WHERE tagcode=#{tagcode} AND cnt > 3

SELECT tagcode FROM (SELECT tagcode, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM (SELECT tagcode FROM (SELECT reviewno FROM review WHERE type=#{type} AND no=#{no}) NATURAL JOIN reviewtohashtag) GROUP BY tagcode) WHERE cnt > 3

SELECT tagcode, tagname FROM (SELECT tagcode, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM (SELECT reviewno FROM review WHERE type=#{type} AND no=#{no}) NATURAL JOIN reviewtohashtag GROUP BY tagcode) NATURAL JOIN hashtagtable WHERE cnt > 3 ORDER BY cnt DESC
